lead_paragraph: A person with knowledge of the negotiations says the Patriots have picked up the option that will keep Pro Bowl tight end Rob Gronkowski in New England through 2019.

headline.print_headline: AP Source: Patriots Pick Up Option for Tight End Gronkowski
headline.main: AP Source: Patriots Pick Up Option for Tight End Gronkowski
